Body.Content:
The Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metric will be added in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report, currently in Preview. This new metric will reflect in the Usage report retroactively starting from November 27th, 2023 likely resulting in an increase in the number of Active users and the Active user rate. The Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded Chat metric, referred to in the report as ‘Copilot chat’, will provide additional insight into Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage and inform adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

Note: If you are using the Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights, the new metric for Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat will likely result in an increase in the ‘Total Copilot users in your company’ metric.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 377675.

When this will happen:

Preview: We will begin rolling out early March 2024 and expect to complete by mid-March 2024.

We will message in the future when we have a firm date for the General Availability rollout. 

How this will affect your organization:

To access the report, visit the Microsoft 365 admin center > Reports > Usage > Copilot for Microsoft 365.

What you need to do to prepare:

No action is needed from you to prepare for this rollout. You may want to notify your admins about this change and update any relevant documentation as appropriate.

Learn more: Microsoft 365 admin center Microsoft 365 Copilot usage - Microsoft 365 admin | Microsoft Learn
